alert.note: Alert for Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:06PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lamoille, northeastern Caledonia, central Orleans and Essex Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 105 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Pittsburg to near Greensboro. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Island Pond, Lyndon, Orleans, Greensboro, Charleston, Westmore, Orleans Village, Glover, Brownington, Albany, Burke, Brunswick, Sutton, Barton, Averill, Sheffield, Newark, Newark Hollow, Brownington Village and Lemington. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 144 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
